maqras.text: Mi sen d ippunefk mmi s n Meryem, d amedya, agdud ik iugwi t
Qqaôen: "ppif iôebbiten nne$, ne$ Neppa"? Qqaôen ak d akka, i nnmara. Ih, nitni d agdud ipmeôéan
Neppa d amdan kan. N$at it, Nerra t d amedya i At Isôail
Lemmer i£ £ ihwi, a Nerr lmalayek di tmurt, deg umkan nnwen
Neppa, s tidep, d ppbut n yimir. Ur ppilit di ccekk fellas. Ddut yidi; wagi d abrid uwqim
Ur kwen issefra$ Cciîan! Ih, neppa d acengu nnwen n ûûeê
Mi n iusa Âisa s issekniyen, inna: "usi$ d $uôwen s ûûwab, ad awen beggne$ kra, seg wayen i$ef temgarradem. Ihi, êezzbet i Öebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Öebbi, s tidep, d Mass iw u d Mass nnwen. Ihi, âabdet eÏ, d wagi ay d abrid uwqim
Mgarraden ikabaren garasen. A tawa$it n wid idensen, ilmend uâaqeb n wass aqeôêan
Day a pôaoun imir, ad asen d ias, deqzalla, nitni ur bnin
Iêbiben, assen, ad u$alen wa d acengu n wa, kkes ed wid ipêezziben
A yimdanen iW, assa, ur telli tugdi fellawen, ur $webblet
Wid iumnen s issekniyen nne£, u llan d imvuâen
Kecmet Loennet, kunwi akked tlawin nnwen, a ppezhum
Ad asen ddewwiôen, s sniwat n uwôe$, akked ibuqalen; degsen ayen cihwant teôwiêin, ayen iqennâen allen. Kunwi, din, ad twekkôem
D tagi ay d Loennet i tweôtem, ilmend n wayen txeddmem
Degs, i kunwi, aîas n izwayen, segsen a ppeççem
Ibe$wviyen, s tidep, deg uâaqeb n Loahennama, ad wekkôen
Ur ipfukku fellasen. Nitni, degs, ad kkufferen
Ur ten Nednis, maca llan, nitni, d imednas
Ad necden: "a Malik, xas ad a$ Iqfeô Mass ik"! A d ini: "war ccekk, a pwellfem
Ni$ Nusa n $uôwen, s tidep, maca tegwti, degwen, keôhen tidep
Ne$ undin ticeôkep. Ula d Nekwni Neppandi
Ne$ $ilen ur Nsell ara i lesrar nnsen, akked tumlin nnsen. Ihi, imceggâen nne£, $uôsen, pparun
Ini: "lemmer illi mmi s i Uênin, nek d aâbad amenzu
Gedha s Mass n tmurt akked igenwan, Mass n usgeld, mgal ayen pxeôôiven
Anef asen ad nexxôen, ad uraren, alamma mmugren ass nnsen, i sen ippuwaââden
D Neppa ay d Öebbi deg igenni, d Öebbi di tmurt, u d Bab n ûûwab, d Amusnaw
Iôqa Win Ilan tagelda n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen. Iéôa melmi ay d imir. £uüôeS, ara tu$alem
Wid i la naâôen, war Neppa, ur $uôsen kra n ccafuâa, kkes ed inagan n tidep, u nitni éôan
Ma testeqûav ten anwa iten Ixelqen, a d inin, war ccekk, "d Öebbi". Ihi, acimi zzin akin
Timenna s: "a Mass iw! Wigi, s tidep, d agdud ur numin
Wexxeô asen, ini: "tifrat"! Deqqal ad éôen
Ëm
S Tezmamt ipbegginen
Nessader ip id, ih, deg iv iôqan. Ih, Nekwni, Nella d ineddaôen
Iban ed degs, yal lameô uûwib
Lameô s$uône£. Ih, Nekwni Nella d wid Ippaznen
Aêunu s$uô Mass ik. Ih, Neppa Isell, d Amusnaw
Mass n tmurt, igenwan akked wayen illan garasen, ma tepputebbtem
Ur illi ôebbi siwa Neppa. Issidir, Ineqq. D Mass nnwen, u Mass n lejdud nnwen, imezwura
Xaîi! Nitni, di ccekk, ppuraren
Qaôaâ ass, ideg ara d iawi igenni, abbu ipbegginen
Ad i$umm imùdanen. Wagi d aâaqeb aqeôêan
A Mass nne$! Kkes a$ aâaqeb; nekwni d lmumnin
Amek ara sâun asmekti, wanag iusa ten id Umazan ipbegginen
D$a wexxôen as, u nnan: "d aselmad aôehbani". ²
Ma Nessenqes awen cwiî uâaqeb, ihi, kunwi, a ppu$alem ar din
Ass ideg ara Neédem fellasen, ééedma tabarart, war ccekk, a d Nerr ppaô
